Hi guys, does anyone else have a this bug?

At random intervals during the turn-based map, it randomly "quick loads" - this is especially annoying much later in the game when you've spent 10 minutes managing your entire kingdom only for it to go back to the start of the round.

A similar thing happend during battles where it will freeze breifly then, 1. bring up the "console" so I can't see what I'm doing and 2. speed the game up to full speed so I lose control of my strategy and finally 3. the sound disappears.

Any idea if there's a Keyboard shortcut error or just a general bug? Anyone else get this problem?

Otherwise this is an AMAZING game 10/10
